author: craigmcc
msg: Migrate the attributes created by the <html:form> tag (the form tag
instance itself, and a reference to the form bean itself) from page scope
to request scope.  Among other things, this change enables the use of a
separate JSP page (accessed by <jsp:include> or the template tag library)
to contain the input fields, nested inside an <html:form> tag instance.
PR: Bugzilla #932
Submitted by:	Lajos Incze <incze@mail.matav.hu>

author: craigmcc
msg: Correct references to the struts-template.tld file to reflect how the
standardized build procedure constructs web applications.
PR: Bugzilla #1382
Submitted by: Michael Gerdau <mgd@technoise.de>

author: craigmcc
msg: Expose the zero-relative offset of the current loop iteration to nested
custom tags.  If you specify an "offset" property, the first time through
the loop getIndex() will return that offset.  If you did not specify an
"offset" property, the first time through the loop getIndex() will return
zero.
PR: Bugzilla #1565
Submitted by:	niall.pemberton@btinternet.com

author: craigmcc
msg: Remove any attempt to unload the contents of the pseudo-database back to
an XML file, because there is no way to accomplish this portably.
PR: Bugzilla #1565
Submitted by:	dmiser@wi.rr.com

author: craigmcc
msg: Remove obsolete "import" statements.
